men's, not man's.

comment.author: 52889903@N03
comment._content: Herz's ticket office appears in this photo as well: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2163152033/ Could it possibly be that during the strike labourers sought casual work elsewhere. In the other photo Herz is offering work in the railways. Horizontal mobility in the transport sector?
